items.title: LVMH-backed investor group takes 20% stake in private jet company Flexjet
items.description: CNBC's Robert Frank reports on news regarding private equity's investment in the private flight industry.

items.title: Luxury shopper recovery faces four key headwinds
items.description: Luxury stocks climbed Friday as investors bet on the emergence of green shoots of recovery within the sector.

items.title: Auction sales fall 6% in the first half, raising fears of an art market shift
items.description: Auction sales have been declining for the third year in a row and are down 44% — or more than $3 billion — from the first six months of 2022.

items.title: Moncler raises prices on tariffs, may postpone store openings if downturn worsens
items.description: The Italian luxury retailer said it had raised prices by "mid-single-digit" percentages for the second half of 2025 and the first half of next year.

items.title: LVMH-backed investor group takes 20% stake in private jet company Flexjet
